    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TableReferenceByExpression table(QueryExpression query)
      Creates a new table reference, which will use the values returned by query as if they were values of the table.
      TableReferenceByName table(TableName tableName)
      Creates a new table reference, which uses given table name, without table alias.
      TableAlias tableAlias(String tableNameAlias)
      Creates a new alias for table.
      TableNameFunction tableName(SQLFunctionLiteral function)
      Creates a new table name representing a call to SQL function without a schema.
      TableNameDirect tableName(String tableName)
      Creates a new table name, which isn't schema-qualified.

    • Method Detail

      • table

        public TableReferenceByName table(TableName tableName)
        Description copied from interface: TableReferenceFactory

        Creates a new table reference, which uses given table name, without table alias.

        Calling this method is equivalent to calling TableReferenceFactory.table(TableName, TableAlias) and passing null as second parameter.

        Specified by:
        table in interface TableReferenceFactory
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name to use.
        Returns:
        The new TableReferenceByName.

      • tableName

        public TableNameDirect tableName(String tableName)
        Description copied from interface: TableReferenceFactory

        Creates a new table name, which isn't schema-qualified.

        Calling this method is equivalent to calling TableReferenceFactory.tableName(String, String) and passing null as first parameter.

        Specified by:
        tableName in interface TableReferenceFactory
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table.
        Returns:
        The new TableName.

      • tableAlias

        public TableAlias tableAlias(String tableNameAlias)
        Description copied from interface: TableReferenceFactory

        Creates a new alias for table.

        Calling this method is equivalent to calling TableReferenceFactory.tableAliasWithCols(String, String...) and not pass anything to varargs parameter.

        Specified by:
        tableAlias in interface TableReferenceFactory
        Parameters:
        tableNameAlias - The alias for table name.
        Returns:
        The new TableAlias.

      • table

        public TableReferenceByExpression table(QueryExpression query)
        Description copied from interface: TableReferenceFactory

        Creates a new table reference, which will use the values returned by query as if they were values of the table.

        Calling this method is equivalent to calling TableReferenceFactory.table(QueryExpression, TableAlias) and passing null as second parameter.

        Specified by:
        table in interface TableReferenceFactory
        Parameters:
        query - The query to use.
        Returns:
        The new TableReferenceByExpression.

      • tableName

        public TableNameFunction tableName(SQLFunctionLiteral function)
        Description copied from interface: TableReferenceFactory
        Creates a new table name representing a call to SQL function without a schema. This is equivalent to calling TableReferenceFactory.tableName(String, SQLFunctionLiteral) and passing null as first argument.
        Specified by:
        tableName in interface TableReferenceFactory
        Parameters:
        function - The function to call.
        Returns:
        Table name representing a call to SQL function without a schema.
